issue.title: N4475 Default comparisons (R2), N4476 Thoughts about Comparisons (R2), N4126, N4114, N3950 Defaulted comparison operators, N4175 Default comparisons, N4176 Thoughts about Comparisons, N4239 Defaulted Comparison Using Reflection
issue.submitter: Oleg Smolsky, Bjarne Stroustrup, Andrew Tomazos, Mike Spertus

discussion.p: Proposal + the ability to default as global
Proposal + the ability to default as global + the generation of negated operators
Mutable members are not special (participate in the comparisons)
Mutable members do not participate in generated comparisons
Proposal + the ability to default as global + mutables ill-formed
The guidance of the vote is not very clear, but what seems clear is that EWG more or less encouraged the paper author to come up with a revised proposal.
Discussed in Urbana. EWG voiced preference towards an opt-in approach.

Discussed in Lenexa. The design changes that alleviate compatibility concerns gained EWG support. There is ongoing work to produce Core wording, but that work raised further design questions. The design paper needs an update for Kona.

issue.resolution: The paper contains the proposed wording.
